title: 215. Why Do We Really Follow the News?
description: There are all kinds of civics-class answers to that question. But how true are they? Could it be that we like to read about war, politics, and miscellaneous heartbreak simply because it's (gasp) entertaining?
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: There are all kinds of civics-class answers to that question. But how true are they? Could it be that we like to read about war, politics, and miscellaneous heartbreak simply because it's (gasp) entertaining?
